title: Hijab Row Live: Protests outside colleges across Karnataka as students wearing hijabs denied entry - Deccan Herald
content:
1. Hijab Row Live: Protests outside colleges across Karnataka as students wearing hijabs denied entry  Deccan Herald
  2. OIC raises hijab row, India calls it ‘communal mindset’  Times of India
  3. Karnataka BJP Shares Personal Details of Minor 'Hijab Ban' Petitioner Students  The Wire
  4. ‘Hijab personal choice, not against Constitution, troubles no one in class’  Deccan Herald
  5. Madhya Pradesh Students In Burkha Heckled With 'Jai Shri Ram' Chants  NDTV
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Several students wearing hijabs in colleges across Karnataka staged fresh protest on Wednesday as they were denied entry citing High Court's interim order. Section 144 has been imposed near SJMVS' Arts & Commerce College for Women in Hubballi. Meanwhile, Karnataka Home Minister maintained that 'overall situation was peaceful'. On Tuesday, hundreds of students across the state boycotted classes.
